name: Bala Rider's Demise
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
The Bala Plokami knows the best time to strike is when the enemy is already down. They're playful like that.
Trigger An observed creature within 30 feet of Bala Plokami gained the prone condition.
Target the observed creature and attempt to grab them. Attempt a Spell Attack against the target's Reflex DC. 
Critical Success Target is considered restrained to the ground. 
Success Target is considered grabbed.
Critical Failure Target avoids the attack completely and manages to crawl 5 feet.
